'''Mythcon 44''' was the forty-fourth annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference. 

*'''Theme:''' "Green and Growing: The Land and Its Inhabitants in Fantasy"
*'''Guests of Honor:''' [[Douglas A. Anderson]] (Inkling scholar), and Franny Billingsley (fantasy author)
